modifications: Updated create_snapshot method signature to include user_id
Added webhook trigger in create_snapshot method

patterns_discovered: Asynchronous webhook handling in synchronous context
Logging for webhook scheduling and delivery
gotchas_discovered: Handling scenarios with no running event loop
Preventing webhook errors from interrupting main workflow
Ensuring webhook delivery doesn't block snapshot process

approach_outcome.changes_made: Added webhook trigger for snapshot completion event
risks_mitigated: Webhook delivery failures won't interrupt snapshot process
Supports both async and sync contexts

recommendations: Consider adding more granular error handling for webhook delivery
Add metrics or additional logging for webhook performance tracking
